# kCIInputAmountKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Image ](/documentation/coreimage)

- [ kCIInputAmountKey ](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputamountkey)

-  kCIInputAmountKey 

Global Variable# kCIInputAmountKey

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
let kCIInputAmountKey: String
```

## [See Also](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputamountkey#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputamountkey#Constants)

[`let kCIOutputImageKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kcioutputimagekey)A key for the [`CIImage`](/documentation/coreimage/ciimage) object produced by a filter.[`let kCIInputBackgroundImageKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputbackgroundimagekey)A key for the [`CIImage`](/documentation/coreimage/ciimage) object to use as a background image.[`let kCIInputImageKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputimagekey)A key for the [`CIImage`](/documentation/coreimage/ciimage) object to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this key refers to the foreground image.[`let kCIInputTimeKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputtimekey)Specify a time.[`let kCIInputDepthImageKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputdepthimagekey)A key for an image with depth values.[`let kCIInputDisparityImageKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputdisparityimagekey)A key for an image with disparity values.[`let kCIInputTransformKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputtransformkey)Transformation to apply.[`let kCIInputScaleKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputscalekey)The amount of scale to apply.[`let kCIInputAspectRatioKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputaspectratiokey)Aspect Ratio.[`let kCIInputCenterKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputcenterkey)A key for a [`CIVector`](/documentation/coreimage/civector) object that specifies the center of the area, as *x* and *y*- coordinates, to be filtered.[`let kCIInputRadiusKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputradiuskey)The distance from the center of an effect.[`let kCIInputAngleKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputanglekey)The angle.[`let kCIInputRefractionKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputrefractionkey)The index of refraction to use.[`let kCIInputWidthKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputwidthkey)A key for a scalar value that specifies the width of the effect.[`let kCIInputSharpnessKey: String`](/documentation/coreimage/kciinputsharpnesskey)Amount of sharpening to apply.
